questions.question: You can change clothes instantly anywhere
questions.but: Your wardrobe can't change from now on.

questions.question: You can eat all your favorite foods without gaining weight
questions.but: You can never eat dessert again.

questions.question: You can become the best player in your favorite sport
questions.but: You have to practice 10 hours every day for the rest of your life.

questions.question: You can have a perfect memory and never forget anything
questions.but: You can never learn anything new.

questions.question: You can have the ability to fly
questions.but: You can never ride in a car or use any other means of transportation.

questions.question: You can travel to any place in the world for free
questions.but: You can never travel with your friends or family.

questions.question: You can become a famous celebrity
questions.but: You have to give up all your privacy and live in the public eye.

questions.question: You can have unlimited money
questions.but: You can never spend it on yourself; you must donate all of it to charity.

questions.question: You can live forever and never age
questions.but: You have to watch all your loved ones grow old and pass away.

questions.question: You can have the power to read minds
questions.but: You can't control when you hear people's thoughts, and you hear everything they think.

questions.question: You can become the smartest person in the world
questions.but: You lose all your creativity and artistic abilities.

questions.question: You can have the ability to teleport
questions.but: You can only teleport to places you have never been before.

questions.question: You can have a perfect romantic partner who loves you unconditionally
questions.but: You can never have any other friends or relationships.

questions.question: You can have the power of super strength
questions.but: You have to use your strength to help others and can never use it for personal gain.

questions.question: You can have the ability to time travel
questions.but: You can never change anything in the past or future.

questions.question: You can become a famous author
questions.but: You can never write under your own name; you must use a pseudonym.

questions.question: You can have the power to heal any illness or injury
questions.but: You have to take on the pain and suffering of the person you heal.

questions.question: You can have the ability to speak and understand all languages
questions.but: You can never speak your native language again.

questions.question: You can have a perfect body with no health issues
questions.but: You can never eat your favorite foods again.

questions.question: You can have the power to control the weather
questions.but: You can only use it for the benefit of others and never for personal gain.

questions.question: You can have the ability to breathe underwater
questions.but: You can never swim in a pool or any other man-made body of water.

questions.question: You can have a personal assistant who does all your tasks and chores
questions.but: You can never do anything for yourself; you become completely dependent on them.

questions.question: You can have the power of invisibility
questions.but: You can only use it when nobody else is around.

questions.question: You can have a pet that can talk and understand you
questions.but: You can never have any other pets.

questions.question: You can have the ability to control minds
questions.but: You have to use your power to manipulate people for the rest of your life.

questions.question: You can have a personal robot that does all your housework
questions.but: You can never do any physical activities or exercise.

questions.question: You can have the power to bring any fictional character to life
questions.but: They become real and live in the real world, causing chaos and disruption.

questions.question: You can have a never-ending supply of your favorite food
questions.but: You can never eat anything else; you have to eat only that food for the rest of your life.

questions.question: You can have the power to control fire
questions.but: You can never feel warmth or comfort from fire again.

questions.question: You can have the ability to communicate with animals
questions.but: You can never have any human friends or relationships.

questions.question: You can have the power to stop time
questions.but: You age twice as fast when time is stopped.

questions.question: You can have the ability to clone yourself
questions.but: Each clone only lives for 24 hours and then disappears.

questions.question: You can have the power of super speed
questions.but: You can never walk or move at a normal pace again.

questions.question: You can have the ability to speak to plants
questions.but: You can never eat any plant-based foods again.

questions.question: You can have the power to control technology
questions.but: You can never use any technology yourself; you have to rely on others for everything.

questions.question: You can have the ability to change your appearance at will
questions.but: Nobody will ever recognize you, including your friends and family.

questions.question: You can have the power to bring peace to the world
questions.but: You can never experience peace or happiness in your own life.

questions.question: You can have the ability to know the answer to any question
questions.but: You can never ask any questions yourself.

questions.question: You can have the power to control animals
questions.but: You can never have a pet or interact with animals in any other way.

questions.question: You can have the ability to control dreams and have lucid dreams every night
questions.but: You can never have a good night's sleep again.

questions.question: You can have the power to bring back a deceased loved one
questions.but: They come back as a ghost and can never interact with the physical world.

questions.question: You can have the ability to instantly learn any new skill or subject
questions.but: You forget something else you already knew every time you learn something new.

questions.question: You can have the power to control gravity
questions.but: You can never experience the sensation of weightlessness.

questions.question: You can have a personal spaceship and explore the universe
questions.but: You can never set foot on Earth again.

questions.question: You can have the ability to speak and understand all animal languages
questions.but: You can never have a conversation with another human being.

questions.question: You can have the power of telekinesis
questions.but: You can only move objects that weigh less than a pound.

questions.question: You can have the ability to see the future
questions.but: You can never change or alter the future in any way.

questions.question: You can have a personal time machine
questions.but: You can only travel to the past and can never return to the present.

questions.question: You can have the power to control the elements (fire, water, air, earth)
questions.but: You can never feel the natural elements (e.g., warmth from the sun, breeze on your skin).

questions.question: You can have the ability to instantly heal any physical injury or illness
questions.but: You can never experience physical pleasure or sensation again.

questions.question: You can have the power to control people's emotions
questions.but: You have to experience all the emotions you manipulate in others.
